mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO M02_SYSTEM_VERSION ( IMSI , CHANNEL , VERSION , LOAD_PATH , DESCRIP , DEL_FLG ) VALUES ( #{iMSI} , #{channel} , #{version} , #{loadPath} , #{descrip} , #{delFlg} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE M02_SYSTEM_VERSION SET IMSI = #{iMSI} , CHANNEL = #{channel} , VERSION = #{version} , LOAD_PATH = #{loadPath} , DESCRIP = #{descrip} , DEL_FLG = #{delFlg} WHERE ID = #{iD}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "iD" , IMSI AS "iMSI" , CHANNEL AS "channel" , VERSION AS "version" , LOAD_PATH AS "loadPath" , DESCRIP AS "descrip" , DEL_FLG AS "delFlg" FROM M02_SYSTEM_VERSION WHERE ID = #{iD}

SELECT ID AS "iD" , IMSI AS "iMSI" , CHANNEL AS "channel" , VERSION AS "version" , LOAD_PATH AS "loadPath" , DESCRIP AS "descrip" , DEL_FLG AS "delFlg" FROM M02_SYSTEM_VERSION WHERE ID = #{iD} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "iD" , IMSI AS "iMSI" , CHANNEL AS "channel" , VERSION AS "version" , LOAD_PATH AS "loadPath" , DESCRIP AS "descrip" , DEL_FLG AS "delFlg" FROM M02_SYSTEM_VERSION WHERE ${_dynamicWhereCondition} ORDER BY ID ORDER BY ${_orderByCondition} FETCH FIRST ${_fetchFirstCondition} ROWS ONLY LIMIT ${_limitCondition} OFFSET ${_offsetCondition}
